name: RunVR
description: Experience the best way of moving through the virtual world by running, jumping, and climbing your way through RunVR.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows™ 7 SP1 or later Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater. Storage: 750 MB available space Additional Notes: Vive Required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better. Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Vive Required
